race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Grasshopper Adventure Series’s 70 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Grasshopper Adventure Series. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
